name: VCA Nederland
tag_list: scc, scc-course, scc-certification, vca, vca-cursus, vca-certificaat
overview:
VCANederland offers SCC service packs amongst which: SCC online training courses, SCC In Company training, SCC exams and the support of companies working towards SCC company certification first and second grade. VCANederland also offers various custom made courses upon request.

VCANederland has assisted companies and their employees in a wide variety of sectors in their certification proces. Amongst certified companies are individuals, sole traders, small-tomedium business and multinationals.

SCC (VCA in Dutch) is the abbreviation for Safety, Health and Environment Checklist Contractors. This SCC checklist serves as a examination and assessment tool for contractors who work for a client. The SCC is a comprehensive programma which ensures service providers are monitored regularly from an objective point of view, and certified in accordance with the Health and Safety regulations system.

VCA is able to assess companies effectively on critical issues that influence a safe, healthy and environmentally friendly work environment, due to the extensive subject coverage of the SCC checklist. A VCA certificaat (SCC certificate) is awarded to companies that meet the standard requirements. Companies that fail to meet the requirements lose their (if applicable) SCC certificate.

VCANederland offers the following VCA courses:

Basisveiligheid VCA or VOL VCA (Basic SCC course) VCA cursus via internet (online SCC course) VCA In Company (In Company SCC course)

The SCC certificate proves to be a useful tool for proving companies meet important health, safety and environmental requirements. It also reduces the amount of steps clients and contractors need to take in order to guarantee good health and safety procedures. The SCC certificate has become a requirement in many situations. Because it is so easy to use, clients often require contracters to produce a SCC certificate before signing a project deal.
